RT @CALFIREBDU #ElDoradoFire **Evacuation Warning is now in effect for the Yucaipa bench area **
Residents may evacuate to Yucaipa Community Center as a temporary evacuation facility. Red Cross is enroute

Three years ago today, the administration arbitrarily tried to end DACA and threw hundreds of thousands of Dreamers’ lives into crisis. I want every Dreamer to know that we still have your back. Your home is here, and we must continue fighting to ensure that.

No matter what Republicans say, remember that they are still in court trying to dismantle the Affordable Care Act and take away health insurance and protections for pre-existing conditions from millions of Americans during a global pandemic.
We must continue speaking these words: Black lives matter, and that includes Black trans lives.

Americans #RespectOurVets and revere our war dead as heroes. Anyone who understands and values the meaning of loyalty, duty, and service to a cause greater than oneself gets that.

📹– Normandy, for the D-Day 75th Anniversary in June 2019.

http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1136808241780928512/pu/img/Yd48C9u2xsErAYjY.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1136808241780928512/pu/vid/480x270/bpfGYPHDuozHhOWf.mp4?tag=10

Trump has repeatedly chosen to foment division and unrest over addressing the damage to our nation. We need moral leadership to stand up to these incitements to violence. https://www.newyorker.com/news/our-columnists/donald-trumps-incitements-to-violence-have-crossed-an-alarming-threshold

No president has been tougher on #China than @realDonaldTrump.

POTUS has:
✅Sanctioned China for its takeover of Hong Kong
✅Sanctioned Chinese Communist Party officials for putting Uighurs in concentration camps
✅Shut down Chinese consulate in Houston

https://www.realclearpolitics.com/articles/2020/09/03/on_national_security_americans_have_a_clear_choice_in_november__144127.html

I’ve been proud to work with @BetsyDeVosED on important #SchoolChoice initiatives to help ensure parents and students are empowered with educational freedom and opportunity. I’ll continue fighting for every student to have access to a quality education.
https://www.detroitnews.com/story/opinion/2020/09/01/opinion-betsy-devos-education-secretary-letter-america-parents-school-choices-covid-19-decisions/3445699001/
We will not let Donald Trump destroy Social Security. Period. https://www.cnn.com/2020/09/01/opinions/social-security-payroll-trump-altman/index.html

A complete and accurate Census count is more important than ever. If you haven't filled out your Census form, please do it online now – and check with your friends, family members, and neighbors to make sure they're counted. https://my2020census.gov/

The Trump administration is undermining the Census, and Republicans are allowing it. An internal @uscensusbureau presentation warns of "serious errors" from rushing the Census. @SenateMajLdr McConnell must let the Senate extend the Census deadlines. https://www.npr.org/2020/09/02/908852878/leak-reveals-warnings-inside-census-that-shortened-schedule-risks-serious-errors

“It’s too hard, give up now.” That’s what they told labor organizers, abolitionists, suffragettes, civil rights leaders, and LGBTQ+ activists. But they stayed in the fight, organized, persisted—and changed the direction of American history. You don't get what you don't fight for.

We can make government work—and not just for the wealthy and well-connected, but for everyone. But only if we elect bold Democrats committed to big, structural change. Find a candidate who moves you and take action to help them win today:

https://elizabethwarren.com/endorsements?source=soc-WB-ew-tw-090520

“Los recientes ‘indultos’ no son más que maniobras de la ‘narcodictadura’ de Maduro para tratar de encubrir años de dolor, injusticias y violaciones a los derechos humanos de sus opositores políticos.” -sen. Marco Rubio https://twitter.com/panampost_es/status/1301931842539487234 QT @PanAmPost_es Las elecciones presidenciales en #EEUU y el tema de #Venezuela https://es.panampost.com/tomas-n-regalado/2020/09/04/las-elecciones-presidenciales-en-eeuu-y-el-tema-de-venezuela/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhFkHIzXYAAUuH_.jpg

Restaurants may survive fear of COVID but will they survive fear of mob violence? https://twitter.com/ScooterCasterNY/status/1302060108898357257 QT @ScooterCasterNY #HappeningNow the protesters in Rochester NY are "shutting down restaurants", tables are broken, people running off scared #rochesterprotests http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1302059901712248834/pu/img/wg4ll-u52Q8owcZI.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1302059901712248834/pu/vid/480x270/ZltJMW5GNEfyQ0Kk.mp4?tag=10

Climate change is an existential crisis. We have got to act as soon as humanly possible. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1302352805575811073/img/SIWXo0QzTCRIPCCq.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1302352805575811073/vid/480x270/hSY03wO3U1eEPQj0.mp4?tag=13

“The lives of Black and Brown people are on the ballot this November, and as long as any of us are oppressed, none of us are free.”  -Tabitha Moore, Rutland Area NAACP Director http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1302344373061873664/img/YAHZen9SFFDbSwrO.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1302344373061873664/vid/480x270/yIcBxQi9SM4qZsTI.mp4?tag=13

“We must lead in an inclusive and innovative way. Because if we only focus on what is happening right now, we will miss opportunities to build a better future and a stronger Vermont.” –@zuckermanforvt http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1302341305981313024/img/orvzvAzc_drKn9Sj.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1302341305981313024/vid/480x270/xXKmMtggC3D9zxAw.mp4?tag=13

The working people of Vermont deserve leaders who will fight for an economy that works for all. Join our town hall with gubernatorial candidate @zuckermanforvt and local organizers to discuss the challenges facing Vermonters this election: https://www.pscp.tv/w/ciKTUjMyNzU3OTl8MW5BS0VBUlJFT3ZLTFyBmhEuI2ZrdGN2E_wNEBBPu29b2kAJ-vZKxmr5Bcxi

Starting soon: tune in to our Vermont town hall featuring @zuckermanforvt, Tabitha Moore, and other special guests. Tune in at 4 p.m. ET at http://live.berniesanders.com. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhLRNU2XsAQ0z8u.jpg

Whether you're excited or not, cast your damn vote. 

This is an existential moment in American history.

For the sake of our democracy, Trump must be defeated. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1302322918668472322/img/OchF2JKQDtdP5lho.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1302322918668472322/vid/480x270/jcyaj2FsUf3aCIdi.mp4?tag=13

"Workers have led. Workers have made sure of our survival. We’re going to have to continue to lead. It doesn’t stop at the ballot box. It continues beyond that." –Stacy Davis Gates, @CTULocal1 Vice President http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1302315599805083649/img/jdIOTEnmdglKr2XK.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1302315599805083649/vid/480x270/XZA3EYA-QUkotbDI.mp4?tag=13

“As our country grapples with coronavirus and social unrest caused by racism and racial injustice, we all must understand it is no exaggeration to say this election will be the most important election of our lifetime.” –Claude Cummings, Vice President of District 6 of CWA http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1302313274361262081/img/7BoTw4qLetV_uuqp.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1302313274361262081/vid/480x270/3hiRB1JxyThCxdZt.mp4?tag=13

This Labor Day we have got to thank all of the essential workers who are keeping the economy going during this pandemic, and acknowledge terrible loss of the thousands of essential workers who have lost their lives. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1302309345137369088/img/-IKQ8iMJ2wTgVzlK.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1302309345137369088/vid/480x270/zJ_2pL2CFR_S6-mF.mp4?tag=13

There is nothing Trump and the corporate elite fear more than a strong union movement. That is why they have done everything in their power to attack unions, and why they must be defeated. Join our Labor Day weekend town hall now: https://www.pscp.tv/w/ciJ3MTMyNzU3OTl8MVBsSlFOWFhxYXF4Rf5b-OFOe3gCsBOo7-AvzFIcJMLPIcoQ5Ve-RGcAtlie

Starting soon: join our Labor Day Weekend town hall on how we must stand up to Trump and rebuild worker power.  Tune in at 2 p.m. ET at http://live.berniesanders.com http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhKwNHwWoA0QV53.jpg

The union movement built America’s working class, and if this moment proves anything, it is that we need the union movement to rebuild the working class. Join me now as we honor workers this Labor Day weekend. https://www.pscp.tv/w/ciJa2TMyNzU3OTl8MUJkeFluUk1NclpLWLpiJ-xrsc_YJA7w8cD05eOYZxrcQCg606-CQp2hHeDN

Starting soon: watch my Labor Day weekend address on honoring workers and addressing the economic crisis. Tune in at 12 p.m. ET at http://live.berniesanders.com. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhKXg7SXgAIiwvS.jpg

At a time of record-breaking heat waves, wildfires, hurricanes and other climate change-fueled disasters, we have a president who doesn’t believe in science. That is unbelievably dangerous. We must defeat Trump and pass a Green New Deal. https://www.washingtonpost.com/weather/2020/09/04/california-heat-wave-fires/

Why do you think they don’t want us to vote? We all know the answer: It’s because they know when we vote, things change. When we vote, we will be seen, we will be heard, and elected officials will be held accountable. VOTE.

This weekend, we must remember that labor built the middle class in our country and lifted up working Americans. We have unions to thank for better wages and safer working conditions. When @JoeBiden and I are in the White House, workers will have us fighting by their side.

RT @JoeBiden As president, I will:

- Call for nationwide mask mandates
- Implement widespread testing
- Accelerate the development of treatments and vaccines

I’m ready to work on day one to contain the spread of this virus and get our country back on track.

Milwaukee, can’t wait to see you soon!
https://www.jsonline.com/story/news/politics/2020/09/04/kamala-harris-campaign-milwaukee-labor-day/5717037002/

Three years ago Trump tried to end DACA.

He failed in the courts, but Dreamers still face uncertainty today.

On day one @JoeBiden will send a bill to Congress to create a path to citizenship for Dreamers and the 11M undocumented people who've strengthened our country for years.

Stay safe this weekend and wear a mask. 
https://www.cnbc.com/2020/09/04/labor-day-weekend-will-set-the-course-for-the-coronavirus-this-fall.html

They should teach this list in journalism school. https://twitter.com/byronyork/status/1301938519070461955 QT @ByronYork Many of the questions for Joe Biden after his remarks today consisted of reporters asking Biden to elaborate on how bad Trump is. 👍“No State shall make...any law which shall abridge the privileges or immunities of citizens of the US; nor shall any State deprive any person of life, liberty, or property, w/o due process of law; nor deny to any person within its jurisdiction the equal protection of the laws.” https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1302212909808971776 QT @realDonaldTrump Trump Orders Purge of ‘Critical Race Theory‘ from Federal Agencies https://www.breitbart.com/tech/2020/09/04/partys-over-trump-orders-purge-of-critical-race-theory-from-federal-agencies/ via @BreitbartNews  This is a sickness that cannot be allowed to continue. Please report any sightings so we can quickly extinguish!

Let’s show our officers that we appreciate them for their dedication to protecting us 👉 https://secure.winred.com/chiproy/backtheblue

Factory farms are breeding grounds for animal abuse and infectious disease. Even full-blown pandemics can be born in these massive, cramped warehouses of livestock.

It's time that we end the cruel practice of factory farming once and for all.

This pandemic is still nowhere near under control. Practicing social distancing, wearing a mask, and avoiding large crowds remain the most reliable ways to lower our infection rate.
https://www.cnbc.com/2020/09/02/dr-fauci-says-us-coronavirus-cases-are-unacceptably-high-going-into-labor-day.html

RT @BobbyScott Without significant federal funding like that provided in the #HeroesAct, most schools can't afford the safety measures needed to protect students, staff & their families.
